Uses of Interface
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources.Pe

  • Packages that use Pe 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts
    Provides Host implementations that represent a Physical Machine (PM) is used to run Vm from different cloud customers (represented by a DatacenterBroker).
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.network
    Provides network-enabled Host implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.power
    Provides power-aware Host implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists
    Provides a set of helper class to manage lists of different objects such as Hosts, VMs, Cloudlets and PEs.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources
    Provides classes that represent different physical and logical Resource used by simulation objects such as Hosts and VMs.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.schedulers.vm
    Provides VmScheduler implementations that are used to schedule the execution of multiple Vm inside a given Host.
    org.cloudsimplus.builders
    Provides Builder classes that implement the Builder Design Pattern to allow instantiating multiple simulation objects more easily.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Pe> HostSimple.getPeList() 
      List<Pe> Host.getPeList()
      Gets the Processing Elements (PEs) of the host, that represent its CPU cores and thus, its processing capacity.

      Gets the max utilization percentage among all PEs.

      Gets the number of BUSY PEs.

      Gets the number of FREE (non-busy) PEs.

      Sets the status of PEs of a host to FAILED or FREE.

    • Uses of Pe in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources that implement Pe 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PeSimple
      Pe (Processing Element) class represents a CPU core of a physical machine (PM), defined in terms of Millions Instructions Per Second (MIPS) rating.

      ASSUMPTION: All PEs under the same Machine have the same MIPS rating.
      Fields in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources declared as Pe 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Pe Pe.NULL
      A property that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for Pe objects.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the free pes list.

      List<Pe> VmSchedulerAbstract.getPeList() 
      Map<Vm,List<Pe>> VmSchedulerAbstract.getPeMap() 
      Map<Vm,List<Pe>> VmScheduler.getPeMap()
      Gets the map of VMs to PEs, where each key is a VM UID and each value is a list of PEs allocated to that VM.
      List<Pe> VmSchedulerAbstract.getPesAllocatedForVM(Vm vm) 
      List<Pe> VmScheduler.getPesAllocatedForVM(Vm vm)
      Gets the list of PEs allocated for a VM.
      protected List<Pe> VmSchedulerSpaceShared.getTotalCapacityToBeAllocatedToVm(List<Double> vmRequestedMipsShare)
      Checks if the requested amount of MIPS is available to be allocated to a VM

      Sets the pe allocation map.
      protected void VmSchedulerAbstract.setPeMap(Map<Vm,List<Pe>> peMap)
      Sets the map of VMs to PEs, where each key is a VM and each value is a list of PEs allocated to that VM.
